title: The impacts of an uncertain economic climate on travel
description: Falling travel demand, new trade conflicts and a falling U.S. dollar shook up travel in 2025, but economic uncertainty looms over 2026, too.
content: The travel industry was among many rocked by a year of uncertainty in 2025 and that trend isn't going anywhere in 2026. A nexus of inflation concerns, consumer pullbacks on travel spending, drops in … [+11126 chars]
